title: what if we made a support stat called Crowd controll
body:
and it would increase CC duration on abilities for a bit not a lot but just a bit or increase the intensity of some slows in the game.

these items would have stuff like Cdr or defensive stats but not a lot in the ways of damage.

the whole using ap to get more CC on supports was never gonna work because of the double dipping into offensive stats.

replies.body: This game does NOT NEED more fucking cc... Are you kidding me..?
no.... theres gonna be 20 second morgana roots
With all the super aggressive bot comps and 4 man tower diving and turret sacking at 5 mins, seems to me we need more aggressive supports than we do cc enhancement.
